segments.text: I see this cozy kitchen with sunlight streaming in from the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a woman standing by the sink, carefully drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so focused on that dish, not noticing anything else around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh no, the sink is overflowing with water pouring out everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is spreading across the floor, right at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got one foot in it already, and she doesn't even realize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she's going to slip any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over to the side, there's a boy climbing on a wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into the cookie jar in the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A little girl is standing there, holding out her hand for a cookie too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just waiting for disaster to strike.
segments.speaker: PAR
